name: Lisinopril and Hydrochlorothiazide
warningsAndPrecautions:
Lisinopril and Hydrochlorothiazide Tablets USP, 10 mg/12.5 mg are blue, hexagonal tablets, with "LL" debossed on one side and "B01" on other side.
                  They are supplied as follows:
                  NDC: 70518-0196-00
                  NDC: 70518-0196-01
                  NDC: 70518-0196-02
                  PACKAGING: 30 in 1 BLISTER PACK
                  PACKAGING: 90 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  PACKAGING: 90 in 1 BOTTLE PLASTIC
                  
                  Storage
                  Store at 20째 to 25째C (68째 to 77째F). [See USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Protect from excessive light and humidity.
                  
                  Repackaged and Distributed By:
                  Remedy Repack, Inc.
